title: Doctor Consultation
description: Personalized consultations to assess individual health needs and tailor Ayurvedic treatments accordingly.

title: Abhyanga
description: A full-body oil massage using warm herbal oils to promote relaxation, improve circulation, and detoxify the body.

title: Swedana
description: A therapeutic steam treatment that induces sweating to eliminate toxins and relieve muscle tension.

title: Vasti
description: An enema therapy using herbal oils or decoctions to cleanse the colon and balance the doshas.

title: Nasyam
description: A nasal administration of herbal oils or powders to clear sinus congestion and improve respiratory health.

title: Udwartanam
description: A deep tissue massage using herbal powders to exfoliate the skin, reduce cellulite, and promote weight loss.

title: Takradhara
description: A therapy where medicated buttermilk is poured over the forehead to relieve stress, insomnia, and migraines.

title: Ante-natal Care
description: Ayurvedic care during pregnancy to support the health of both mother and baby through diet, lifestyle, and therapies.

title: Postnatal Ayurvedic Care
description: Post-delivery care focusing on recovery, lactation support, and restoring the mother's health using Ayurvedic practices.

title: Eye Care
description: Specialized treatments to improve vision and address various eye disorders using Ayurvedic therapies.

title: Panchakarma
description: A comprehensive detoxification program consisting of five cleansing procedures to purify the body and mind.

title: Ayurveda Massage
description: Traditional Ayurvedic massages tailored to individual needs to promote relaxation, healing, and overall well-being.
